meanings.definition: To mark with a star or stars.
meanings.sent1: She starred her favorite book in the library.
meanings.sent2: The teacher starred the correct answers on the test.
meanings.sent3: He starred his calendar to remember the important date.
meanings.sent4: The night sky starred with twinkling lights.
meanings.sent5: The chef starred the menu items that were most popular.

meanings.definition: To feature or highlight as a star performer.
meanings.sent1: The movie starred a famous actor in the lead role.
meanings.sent2: The talent show starred talented singers and dancers.
meanings.sent3: The school play starred a talking dog as the main character.
meanings.sent4: The concert starred a brilliant pianist who mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show starred models showcasing the latest trends.

meanings.definition: To receive a high rating or review.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant starred in the local food critic's review.
meanings.sent2: The new movie starred well in the box office.
meanings.sent3: The hotel starred in the traveler's top picks list.
meanings.sent4: The product starred in the consumer ratings for quality.
meanings.sent5: The app starred with positive feedback from users.
